{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Receptionist",
  "description": "TotalQuest is an institute which specializes on consultancy both in Health, construction and hospitality field.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist
Job Location:&nbsp;Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a minimum of HND in Hospitality with relevant experience.
	Must have worked in a hotel and at the front desk.
	Must be computer literate.
	Must be active on social media.
	Good communication skills are a must.
	Attention to detail and creativity in upselling are a must.


Salary
N80,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@totalquest.net&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-29",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-02",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Total Quest Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Delta",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "188076"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Receptionist Job at Total Quest Limited




        
    

        
        TotalQuest is an institute which specializes on consultancy both in Health, construction and hospitality field.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist
Job Location: Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Interested candidates should possess a minimum of HND in Hospitality with relevant experience.
	Must have worked in a hotel and at the front desk.
	Must be computer literate.
	Must be active on social media.
	Good communication skills are a must.
	Attention to detail and creativity in upselling are a must.


Salary
N80,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@totalquest.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Head, Customer Experience & Products",
  "description": "Consolidated Hallmark Insurance Plc was issued a License to Continue as an Insurer by the National Insurance Commission (NAICOM) with effect from 28th February, 2007, following a successful recapitalisation and merger process. The company which is listed on the trading floor of the Nigerian Stock Exchange has a Board of Directors made up of a crop of high profile and experienced professionals from the oil industry, manufacturing, and the financial services sector of the economy.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Customer Experience &amp; Products

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description


	Lead the future of customer experience
	Define and deliver superior customer journeys.
	Drive product innovation and CX strategy at the highest level.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;MarketingCX@chiplc.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-11",

Head, Customer Experience & Products Job at Consolidated Hallmark Insurance Plc




        
    

        
        Consolidated Hallmark Insurance Plc was issued a License to Continue as an Insurer by the National Insurance Commission (NAICOM) with effect from 28th February, 2007, following a successful recapitalisation and merger process. The company which is listed on the trading floor of the Nigerian Stock Exchange has a Board of Directors made up of a crop of high profile and experienced professionals from the oil industry, manufacturing, and the financial services sector of the economy.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Customer Experience & Products

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Lead the future of customer experience
	Define and deliver superior customer journeys.
	Drive product innovation and CX strategy at the highest level.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: MarketingCX@chiplc.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Front Office Admin",
  "description": "IDP Education Limited is the world&#39;s largest international student placement provider. We help international students study in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, UK, and USA. Our success comes from connecting students with the right course in the right university or institution and in the right country.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Office Admin
Job ID:&nbsp; 3584
Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Purpose


	The Front Office Admin is responsible for providing administrative support to the Office Manager in accordance with IDP policies.
	Strict adherence to administrative requirements is an essential part of the job.


Key Accountabilities


	Administrative &amp; Operational Support
	Customer Service &amp; Communication
	Organizational &amp; Logistical Tasks
	Travel Management
	Office Maintenance
	Office Coordination and Support.


Required Experience


	University Graduate with 2-3 years of experience
	Excellent in English language, especially English speaking &amp; listening
	Customer Service Oriented
	Excellent Communication and Problem-Solving skills
	Committed to and continual learning
	Effective Verbal and Listening
	Microsoft Office Tools
	Time Management skills.


Competencies:


	Attention to detail
	Clarity of thought
	Communication Skills: English
	Cultural Fit
	Customer First
	Familiarity with MS Office/CRM Tools
	Interpersonal Skills
	Learning Ability
	People Management
	Overall Rating.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-29",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-30",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "IDP Education Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "188074"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",

      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Front Office Admin Job at IDP Education Limited




        
    

        
        IDP Education Limited is the world's largest international student placement provider. We help international students study in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, UK, and USA. Our success comes from connecting students with the right course in the right university or institution and in the right country.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Office Admin
Job ID:  3584
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Purpose
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Front Office Admin is responsible for providing administrative support to the Office Manager in accordance with IDP policies.
	Strict adherence to administrative requirements is an essential part of the job.


Key Accountabilities


	Administrative & Operational Support
	Customer Service & Communication
	Organizational & Logistical Tasks
	Travel Management
	Office Maintenance
	Office Coordination and Support.


Required Experience


	University Graduate with 2-3 years of experience
	Excellent in English language, especially English speaking & listening
	Customer Service Oriented
	Excellent Communication and Problem-Solving skills
	Committed to and continual learning
	Effective Verbal and Listening
	Microsoft Office Tools
	Time Management skills.


Competencies:


	Attention to detail
	Clarity of thought
	Communication Skills: English
	Cultural Fit
	Customer First
	Familiarity with MS Office/CRM Tools
	Interpersonal Skills
	Learning Ability
	People Management
	Overall Rating.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
